title: recipes_Beaufort_Stew
text:
Title: Beaufort Stew.
.
Description: Corn, sausage, shrimp, potatoes, and seasonings are all you need to create this traditional South Carolina Low Country favorite..
.
Ingredients:.
- 1 pound smoked sausage links, sliced.
- 10 frozen small corn cobs.
- 10 small red potatoes.
- 1 (3 ounce) package dry crab boil.
- 1.5 pounds unpeeled, large fresh shrimp.
- salt to taste.
.
Instructions:.
- Place the sausage, corn, potatoes, and dry crab boil seasoning mix in a large pot filled with enough water to cover. Bring to a boil over high heat..
- Reduce the heat to low and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 15 minutes. Mix in the shrimp, and continue cooking until opaque, 2 to 3 minutes. Drain, season with salt, and serve hot..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 548 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 55 g.
cholesterolContent: 168 mg.

proteinContent: 34 g.
saturatedFatContent: 7 g.
sodiumContent: 1303 mg.

fatContent: 20 g.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 8 servings.
